con:testCase.name: LP-TC000.2.3 - Cas passant - POST en tant que Writer > Attendu : réponse HTTP 201 + entité créée

con:testStep.name: REST Request - POST Création d'un projet

con:restRequest.name: REST Request - POST Création d'un projet

con:assertion.name: Valid HTTP Status Codes - 201 (best practice for POST methods)
Not Contains - Wrong Authentification case messages

con:configuration.token:
Sorry, JavaScript must be enabled.
Change your browser options, then try again.

con:assertion.name: Not Contains - 'Project name already being used' message

con:configuration.token: constraint-violation message="project name is already being used"/>

con:assertion.name: Not Contains - 'Deadline MUST be after start date' message

con:configuration.token: <constraint-violation message="deadline must be after start date"/>

con:assertion.name: Sensitive Information Exposure

con:configuration.AssertionSpecificExposureList: ~(?s).*Runtime (E|e)rror.*###[Stacktrace] Can give hackers information about which software or language you are using
~(?s).*SQLSTATE: [A-Z0-9].*###[Database error messages] Internal database information can be misused by hackers
~(?s).*(s|S)tack:.*###[Stacktrace] Can give hackers information about which software or language you are using
~(?s).*(s|S)yntax (e|E)rror\s.*###[Stacktrace] Can give hackers information about which software or language you are using
~(?s).*\w+/\d{1,2}(\.\d{1,3})+.*###[Version x.y.z] Exposing version numbers gives unnecessary hints on your systems vulnerabilities
~(?s).*Invalid column name\s.*###[Database error messages] Internal database information can be misused by hackers

~(?s).* (ORA|EXP|IMP|KUP|UDE|UDI|DBV|LCD|QSM|OCI|RMAN|LFI|PLS|PLQ|AMD|CLSR|PROC|PROT|TNS|NNC|NLP|NNF|NMP|NCR|NZE|O2F|O2I|O2U|PCB|PCC|SQL|AUD|IMG|VID|DRG|LPX|LSX)-\d{5}\s .*###[Database error messages] Internal database information can be misused by hackers
~(?s).*(p|P)owered by:? ([a-zA-Z]+)( [a-zA-Z]+){0,3}( |/)\d\.\d{1,2}\.\d{1,3}.*###[Version x.y.z] Exposing version numbers gives unnecessary hints on your systems vulnerabilities

~(?s).*at [\w\$]+(\.[\w\$<>\[\],]+|\.\.ctor)+(\((([\w\$<>\`\[\]]+ [\w\$<>]+, )*(([\w\$<>\`\[\]]+ [\w\$<>]+)))\)|\(\)) .*###[Stacktrace] Can give hackers information about which software or language you are using
~(?s).*<\w+:frame\s*class=".*"\s*line=".*"\s*method=".*"\s*/>.*###[Stacktrace] Can give hackers information about which software or language you are using
~(?s).*Traceback \(most recent call last\):.*###[Stacktrace] Can give hackers information about which software or language you are using
~(?s).*((I|i)ncorrect|(I|i)nvalid) (s|S)yntax.*###[Stacktrace] Can give hackers information about which software or language you are using
~(?s).*(s|S)tack ?(t|T)race.*###[Stacktrace] Can give hackers information about which software or language you are using
~(?s).*(e|E)rror was:\s.*###[Database error messages] Internal database information can be misused by hackers
~(?s).*(v|V)ersion:? \d\.\d{1,2}\.{1,3}-?.*###[Version x.y.z] Exposing version numbers gives unnecessary hints on your systems vulnerabilities
~(?s).*from [\w\$]+(\.[\w\$<>]+)+:\d+:in `.+'.*###[Stacktrace] Can give hackers information about which software or language you are using
~(?s).*Error in process <\d+\.\d+\.\d+> with exit value:.*###[Stacktrace] Can give hackers information about which software or language you are using
~(?s).*STACK\s?TRACE.*###[Stacktrace] Can give hackers information about which software or language you are using
~(?s).*Warning: [\w]+\(\) .+ in .+ on line \d{1,6}.*###[Stacktrace] Can give hackers information about which software or language you are using

~(?s).*((A|a)pache|vBulletin|MySQL|PostgreSQL|phpBB|Internet Information Services)( |/)\d{1,2}(\.\d{1,3})+ .*###[Version x.y.z] Exposing version numbers gives unnecessary hints on your systems vulnerabilities

~(?s).*at [a-zA-Z][\w\$]*(\.[a-zA-Z][\w\$]*)+\((Unknown Source|Native Method|[a-zA-Z][\w\$]*\.([a-zA-Z]{3,5}):\d+)\) .*###[Stacktrace] Can give hackers information about which software or language you are using
~(?s).*[^\s]+\.rb:\d+:in `.+'.*###[Stacktrace] Can give hackers information about which software or language you are using
~(?s).*File ".+", line [0-9]{1,6}, in.*###[Stacktrace] Can give hackers information about which software or language you are using

con:assertion.name: Response SLA
